items.text:
Through the brush you hear two people arguing at each other. One
you immediately recognize as Kordo Haverson, but it takes a moment
before you recognize the other as Spirit Speaker Nal. You don’t think
you’ve heard her raise her voice before.

You push forward and come across the two of them in the midst of a
heated debate. Kordo’s face is flushed, and Nal has her arms crossed
and is glaring. Although you’re not sure what’s going on, you feel like
you should step in.

If Nal is not in play, search the path deck for her, and put her into play
in the same area as Kordo. Do not read her normal entry.
